channel.title: Post your PK's
channel.description: Post any pictures of drops you get from this new BH. Im curious about the new drop system etc, so post em here.

item.title: Post your PK's
item.dc:creator: @lothy Lothy
item.description:
@lothy wrote:

[quote=“Lothy, post:18, topic:277564”]This one was a pilejump, but I don’t care.

Deathmatch. This guy was a good sport. The helm was mine; we no armoured. Nothing too special about the guy; his stats were actually quite inferior to mine, but then he asked for the fight. :rolleyes:

Can’t remember if this was declared a deathmatch, but he ended up dead anyway. He had 69 attack, 99 strength. We were both wearing robes for the fight, but yeah. 82 defence is a winning level.

This was a death match. This guy was 80 attack, 99 strength, probably would have had 20 - 40 defence as well. Quite a good fight, although complaining about someone sitting on 30 health kinda makes you a pussy.

With all of that aside, it’s a lot of fun. You can’t teleport on these worlds, so that’s a non-issue now. The downside is that bind is still the only f2p hold spell you can employ, and it’s not really worth the inventory space. I’m hoping they make snare usable on f2p PVP worlds, because it would be a nice boost to the usability of magic.

EDIT: To put the above kills in perspective, here’s a pic of my stats. Obviously I didn’t get all of the loot above playing on a level 60 account.
[/quote]

Read full topic

item.title: Post your PK's
item.dc:creator: @haticks haticks
item.description:
@haticks wrote:

[quote=“Lothy, post:9, topic:278144”][quote author=haticks link=topic=367125.msg2785827#msg2785827 date=1242493565]

I can’t get anything in f2p. Im a rune pure (40 attack, 40 def, 60 str) and no pures will fight me. They all have 70+ str so they own me no armour, but they run every time. Which gets annoying.

Try using an account that isn’t at such a low level.
[/quote]Haha, Its gettin up there. Getting 60 str and 70 range, and going from there.

Keep the defence at 40, but get 85 range instead of just 70, along with 44 prayer (if you don’t already have it). You’ll be able to no armour fight fine once you do that.[/quote]As of now, 68 str and 65 range. Im broke and can’t afford arrows, so i might bot some pure ess tonight and buy some knives to get it up. Why 44 Prayer?

And Just went pking on my main, and got a rune scimmy. Woohoo?

Read full topic

item.title: Post your PK's
item.dc:creator: @lothy Lothy
item.description:
@lothy wrote:

[quote=“haticks, post:7, topic:278144”][quote author=Lothy link=topic=367125.msg2784182#msg2784182 date=1242385748]

I can’t get anything in f2p. Im a rune pure (40 attack, 40 def, 60 str) and no pures will fight me. They all have 70+ str so they own me no armour, but they run every time. Which gets annoying.

Try using an account that isn’t at such a low level.
[/quote]Haha, Its gettin up there. Getting 60 str and 70 range, and going from there.[/quote]
Keep the defence at 40, but get 85 range instead of just 70, along with 44 prayer (if you don’t already have it). You’ll be able to no armour fight fine once you do that.

Read full topic

item.title: Post your PK's
item.dc:creator: @ephemeral ephemeral
item.description:
@ephemeral wrote:

Nothing really can compete with the old Wilderness. PKing was at its best (in RS2) from 2004-2007. After that, the trading limit and removal of PKing in the Wilderness ruined it all.

It’s a lot better than PvP worlds, no questions asked.
